official-title.#text:
Expressing the sense of the House of
		  Representatives that, in order to make commonsense reforms under sequestration,
		  Federal employees should be encouraged to suggest ways to make more sensible or
		  more efficient budget reductions within their employing department or agency,
		  knowing that they are protected under the whistleblower protection
		  laws.
